THE REALISTIC APPROACH

Every man or woman tries to find one’s ideal goal, one that is the best for them. But no one succeeds in doing so. The best principle to adopt in life is: Try, try by all means to achieve the very best, but when you feel that you can only get the second best then accept it gracefully. Because if you remain in denial, and try to achieve the acme of perfection, that will only land you in a worse predicament. This is the realistic approach. The realistic approach is the only way to save yourself from disaster and to live a tension-free life.

Maulana Wahiduddin Khan I SUNDAY GUARDIAN I June 28 2020
